body.p: I would suggest to your Excellency the appointment of some two or Three aids in my portion of the state, say John Hyden of the county of Clay, John P. Hargis of the county of Breathitt. E. B. Treadway & myself for the county of Owsley. with Those names for a Brace Sir in, my portion of the state, your Excellency would have no cause for fears of Servile or Civil Wars
